instruction: How will the technology of the future change the way we live?
output: The technology of the future will change the way we live by making our lives easier, more efficient, and more immersive. Automation and AI will allow us to complete tasks faster, while virtual and augmented reality will bring us closer to reality and the virtual world. We will have more access to information and be able to access it with ease. Technology will also allow us to experience more immersive and personalized entertainment.
